item.title: Gipsy Hill SE19 ‘plastic’ type street name board for Gipsy, 14th July
item.description:
Gipsy Hill SE19 ‘plastic’ type street name board for Gipsy Hill tagged next to streetlight column ID number 606 # 25 / opposite Colby Rd junction. Please forward fixmystreet.com report to your contractor for picture.

item.title: Lots of bikes and scooters all over, 14th July
item.description:
Regularly hire bikes and scooters are left all over the place and across the pavement so kids can scoot on pavement after nursery for the last 9 months i have had to take this route. Parking is clearly not used appropriately here. Given the amount of anti social behaviour on this stretch of road a CCTV camera there would be appropriate to determine and fine people.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, Bagshot Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gipsy Hill SE19 just before house number 3 (sout, 14th July
item.description:
Gipsy Hill SE19 just before house number 3 (south side) next to the bus stop / streetlight column 606 # 3 is Lambeth black square bin graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com report to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4202348,-0.0832111,3a,75y,302.38h,72.8t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sBmqITmCBn96bBkHcLPQnZQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D17.204278385666157%26panoid%3DBmqITmCBn96bBkHcLPQnZQ%26yaw%3D302.38441344519714!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDcwOS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
